title: 1935 Balkan Cup
text: The 1935 Balkan Cup was the sixth <a href="Balkan%20Cup">Balkan Cup</a> <a href="association%20football">football</a> tournament. The <a href="national%20team">national team</a>s of <a href="Kingdom%20of%20Yugoslavia">Yugoslavia</a>, <a href="Second%20Hellenic%20Republic">Greece</a>, <a href="Kingdom%20of%20Bulgaria">Bulgaria</a> and <a href="Kingdom%20of%20Romania">Romania</a> took part and it was won by <a href="Yugoslavia%20national%20football%20team">Yugoslavia</a>. The host of the tournament was <a href="Bulgaria%20national%20football%20team">Bulgaria</a>. The top goalscorer was Liubomir Angelov from Bulgaria with 6 goals which come in the form of two hat-tricks.
